Frequently Asked Qusetions

Get Your General Answer

What are the benefits of homeopathy?



Homeopathy is free of steroids. It is infact derived from plants ad hence has no side effects. For this reason, it is best suited to pregnant and lactating women , young children and even the even the elderly. Homeopathy also cures many autoimmune diseases which have no cure in the mainstream medicine.



Is it true that homeopathy medicine works very slowly?{" "}



With the right medication under an expert homeopath, you ca feel the relief in a short span of time. Moreover, the way HOMEOZ works, you will cure it permanently.



What if I face a problem during the course of treatment?{" "}



You can always reach out to us and our team will be more than happy to help-answer any queries that you may have and help you understand as well as tackle anything hampering your recovery.
